sentence.Network_en: Without law, liberty also loses its nature and its name, and becomes licentiousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有法律, 自由也同样名实具亡, 就是无法无天.

list.abs: ...北巨蟹蛛（学名：Heteropoda licenti）为巨蟹蛛科巨蟹蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于山东、辽宁等地，常生活于山地或旱田。该物种的模式产地在山东、辽宁。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies.
...利氏园蛛（学名：Araneus licenti）为园蛛科园蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于北京等地。该物种的模式产地在北京。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Araneus licenti.
...北平腹蛛（学名：Gnaphosa licenti）为平腹蛛科平腹蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于山西等地。该物种的模式产地在山西。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Gnaphosa licenti<.
...里氏猫蛛（学名：Oxyopes licenti）为猫蛛科猫蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于甘肃等地。该物种的模式产地在甘肃。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Oxyopes licenti.

entry.tran: 不道德的；（尤指）放荡的，淫乱的
entry.def: If you describe a person as licentious, you mean that they are very immoral, especially in their sexual behaviour.

example.tran: 关于放荡淫乱行为的骇人听闻的故事

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being lewd and lascivious

auth_sentence.content: Falling from self-control to relaxed ease is very different from falling from self-control to licentiousness.
